item.title: Apache 2.4: IP Whitelisting
item.description: ... ... AuthType Basic AuthName "Development Area" AuthUserFile /var/www/sites/.htpasswd <RequireAny> Require ip 19.233.95.152 Require ip 31.169.217.174 Require ip 33.202.255.41 Require ip 31.175.111.184 Require ip 51.209.11.159 Require ip 129.162.144.55 Require valid-user </RequireAny> ... ... See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10419592/htaccess-htpasswd-bypass-if-at-a-certain-ip-address
